tekSoftwareTool.name: SonarQube Community Edition
tekSoftwareTool.tags: sast, ssdlc, security, static analysis, code quality
tekSoftwareTool.description: SonarQube is an open-source platform designed for continuous inspection of code quality and security. It supports multiple programming languages, including Java, C#, JavaScript, Python, and more. SonarQube helps developers to identify bugs, vulnerabilities, and code smells in real-time, ensuring that the software meets high standards of quality and security.

license.name: LGPL v3.0
